revised_title: First and Second Order Equations in Quantum Theory and their Connection to Electromagnetic Phenomena
tldr: The authors explore the connection between first and second order equations in quantum theory and electromagnetic phenomena. They propose a five-dimensional approach to unify the theories of gravitation and electromagnetism, and discuss the role of symmetric and antisymmetric components in these equations. The study aims to provide a more comprehensive understanding of the quantum theory and its relation to electromagnetic fields.
